message.body: Hey just I saw this thing on tv and it leads me to believe your bird in the garden will most likely have the opposite affect you desire. Some people use those things to hunt cause it attracts birds. ...not quite the Owl effect you want. Figured I'd let you know. ...if it matters.
Oh wow. I just saw this. I'll research it tomorrow at work. Thanks for the heads up and thanks for all your help this weekend. I love you being around.

Of course! And I love being there and helping in any way I can. I hope I end up being wrong and you can put your birdie anywhere you want. Just figured I would bring it up cuz I saw it randomly on TV. I'm sure you'll work it out cor the best either way...
Maybe I'll try it a different way each year and monitor how well the veggies grow each time
Maybe I'll start a research project and make millions off the findings
